entry.title: The Cost Of Loving You
entry.summary:
Author: Iceprincess96

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,806Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 82

Summary: Eddie thought that when he finally confessed his love to Buck, he had found his happy ending. But the universe seemed intent on testing him. Three months into their relationship, Buck breaks up with him over pancakes, leaving Eddie shattered. As Buck moves on and starts seeing someone new, Eddie spirals, hiding his heartbreak behind a fragile mask of friendship. When the weight of unspoken feelings finally cracks, both men are forced to confront the love, fear, and mistakes that kept them apart. With the 118 as witnesses, and Chris as the heart between them, Eddie and Buck must navigate heartbreak, trust, and the slow, painful road to redemption — discovering that love can survive even when it’s broken.   Previous Title - Shattered and whole

entry.title: Buckley's Chance
entry.summary:
Author: RaspberryDreams1

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,668Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 134

Summary: Evan knows that wish babies are extremely rare, the Fae only grant a handful of wishes per year and almost never to single parents. But Evan so desperately wants a family to love that he’s been subconsciously wishing since he was a teenager. Eddie hadn’t thought of wishing for a baby, he had barely heard of wish babies or soulmates, his parents didn’t believe in such things. Eddie desperately wanted a place for him and his son to belong, a family that would accept him without demanding that he change who he was to fit their impossibly unrealistic expectations.

entry.title: i'll drive all night, i'll call your mom
entry.summary:
Author: eddielovers

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,627Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: Eddie is moving to Texas. Buck pretends to not be devistated. Eddie asks Buck to go on the cross country roadtrip with him. Instead of the day of non-stop driving it takes them a week of adventures from camping to vegas to the wonders of the grand canyon to finally get to their destination. It's going ot fucking kill Buck, who is trying not to admit he's hopelessly in love with this man. S8A Mid season break fic. S8B, dont know her.

entry.title: Even the Dead Still Breathe
entry.summary:
Author: BlckOnyx

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 57,266Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 54

Summary: It has been a year since Bobby’s death, and Buck has never been the same. Grief eats at him in quiet ways the rest of the 118 can’t quite reach, so when he announces he’s taking a break and heading abroad, everyone tells themselves he deserves the space. A week later, he disappears. Weeks turn into months, and the people he left behind are forced to believe the unthinkable—that Buck walked away for good. Until the headlines change, and the word “presumed dead” settles over them like ash. What none of them know is that Buck’s story didn’t end there. His grief, his secrets, and the dangerous truth he’s been carrying all lead back to a past no one at the 118 ever imagined. And when the pieces finally surface, the loss they thought they understood becomes something else entirely. How will the 118 deal with losing people they love, only to find out later that it was all a lie? OR Buck disappeared, and the truth might destroy what’s left of the family they built.

entry.title: stay alive, open wide
entry.summary:
Author: dogfishmonger

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 292,671Chapters: 29/40Kudos: 806

Summary: He feels like shit when he's hungry, and he plays better when he's empty. The cold air doesn't touch him as much. The floodlights turn silvery-soft.And he likes eating. Keeps his hands busy, mouth busy, mind busy. Something to chew through, putty in the ears.Go until he can't anymore. Cycle it back out. Be ready. --OR: Buck's had on-again, off-again bulimia since he was 14.--Updates on Wednesdays. Title from Psychic Friend's "We Do Not Belong".

entry.title: The Devil Went Down To El Paso
entry.summary:
Author: thefuzzzz

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,602Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 25

Summary: Eddie knew then what Buck was. Maybe he knew the whole time, but at least he could act like he didn't.He knew the devil would come as everything he'd ever wanted, and not to take the Lord's name in vain, but God, he was everything Eddie wanted. He worked hard, he had a nice smile, he joked around, he was a good cook, and he was beautiful. Even now, with the fire of Eddie's burning ranch lighting his face, he looked divine in a way he shouldn't.Buck was the devil.

entry.title: Into the Abyss
entry.summary:
Author: Marie_Nola

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,463Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 161

Summary: With his colleague out sick with the flu, aspiring journalist Evan “Buck” Buckley is sent to interview the crew of station 118 in her place. There he catches the eye of medic Eddie Diaz. A man with a dangerous darkness lurking behind his affable demeanor that draws Buck in like a fly to honey. The two quickly fall into an intense relationship. But when Buck’s past comes back to haunt him, and a new threat looming in the shadows, he faces an impossible choice. Run, or give himself completely into Eddie’s keeping. *Semi inspired by Fifty Shades of Grey, where Buck is an inspiring journalist with a bad relationship track record who finds himself in the crosshairs of a serial killer.

entry.title: Buck and the quest for gender
entry.summary:
Author: Werewolf_Origins

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,490Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 135

Summary: Every morning, Buck said goodbye to Vee, with a pat on the head. Sometimes, he took them around the house with him, during his morning routine. He would look in the mirror after flossing, practising his newfound vocabulary: "This is Vee, they go by they/them pronouns." Again, dumb. It helped some deep, unidentifiable part of him though, so it stayed.   Or: Buck meets a nonbinary person, becomes emotionally attached to a plushie, has a gender crisis, confesses his undying love for his best friend, and remembers he has a family who loves him. Maybe in that order.

entry.title: Under Your Cowboy Hat
entry.summary:
Author: Noasshowaddiction

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,283Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 25

Summary: A crowded Texas bar. Neon lights flicker, music pulses, and the scent of beer and leather hangs in the air. Eddie tips a cowboy hat onto Buck’s head, their fingers brush, and suddenly the world narrows to just them. Their lips meet—teasing, urgent, and electric—messy in the best way, leaving both of them breathless, grinning, and dizzy with the thrill of something new. It’s a kiss that lingers long after they part, a spark they can’t ignore… even if life tries to pull them apart. Or they meet at a bar and have an amazing kiss that nether of them can’t stop thinking about. What will happen if they only meet again years later.

entry.title: coffee | Buck and Eddie
entry.summary:
Author: titaniclikeship003

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,668Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 40

Summary: Buck woke up to a cold bed, and for a moment, his sleep-deprived mind thought he was still in the loft, until he looked up and saw stars. They were small, glow-in-the-dark and softly lit in the dim morning sun. Chris had begged for them, and when Buck and Eddie finally surrendered, they hung them above his bed and then he’d insisted that Eddie’s room have some too. He squinted, the stars coming into view as he did, and he smiled, until the events of the night slowly sharpened into focus along with the shapes. or the morning after when buck spirals
